sitesupport: Iri fo kyeɛo naŋ ta lɛ
wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Ka fooŋ wa seebi a leɛore lɛ wulo ka fo sagɛɛ ka [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], ane fo la sagɛɛ sagebo meŋa ka fo na barɛɛ fo toma ko [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_Creative_Commons_Attribution-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported_License CC BY-SA 3.0 License] ane a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
Fo sagɛɛ ka a hyperlink bee URL eeɛ sufficient attribution ko a Creative Commons license.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
''' Fo saseɛ miri youri[[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|pɔgʋ la a wikis nuuri zaa poɔ]].'''

Bone naŋ e ko page la $1 ($2).
Ka ananso la ''$3''.

* A pagebo piili la $4
* O baaroo la $5

Fo pampana saseɛ miri youri la $6.
Sɔroo paali a ama zaa a yel-peɛrɛ fo naŋ na e.

Ka fõõ sage di ka ba da page fo la a yi babambo, fo na baŋ bɔ la yɛlɛ ane sobi-tuuree yi [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] donɛɛ zaa yelnyɔgeraa.
Ka lɛ naaŋ, ka fõõ na di dɛmɛ kyaare a pagebo sɔroo [[m:Steward requests/Global|eŋ leɛ kaabo noɔre a Meta-Wiki]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''Yelle ayi na soŋ a fo tomboɔlo la [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|globally blocked]].'''

Neɛ naŋ na maale a sɛgre $1 ($2).
Ba teɛroo wala''$3''.

* piili sɛgrɛ: $4
* O baaroŋ bibiri: $5

A sɛgre yeli nyɔgeraa wa la$6.
Kyɛ naŋ eŋ yɛlɛ naŋ zaa a see ka fo eŋ

Ka foŋ sage ka a da ba taa sore kɔɔ iri fo bare sɛ ka fo duoro mine bee sommo mine ayi a[[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] Teŋdaazaa yelnyɔgraa.
Agaŋ a zaa, fo naŋ na yele yɛlɛ kyaare ne a sɛgebo [[m:Steward requests/Global|be emmo kaŋa kyɛ leɛ kaa a Meta-Wiki]].
